meta_desc: Sundaram Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is Small Cap Equity mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 2/10. It has track record of 11 years, with three year return of 25.49. Risk is Very High
scheme_name: Sundaram Small Cap Fund Direct Growth
exit_load: For units more than 25% of the investments, an exit load of 1% if redeemed within 365 days.
description: The scheme seeks to achieve capital appreciation by investing predominantly in diversified stocks that are generally termed as smallcap stocks.

amc_info.name: Sundaram Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: Sundaram Towers No. 46,,1st& 2nd Floor, Whites Road,Royapettah Chennai 600014
amc_info.description: Sundaram Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 26/02/1996 and its managing total assets of â‚¹33,150 Cr. Its ranked at 14 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
This asset management company has an experience of over 20 years and is a wholly owned subsidiary of an extremely prestigious NBFC - Sundaram Finance Limited.

With a wide range of products offered under the Sundaram banner, Sundaram mutual funds have also made a mark in the financial industry. It offers a wide range of schemes, starting from equity, debt, income and liquid funds.

The fund management team boasts of an excellent research and analytical team that analyzes market conditions to optimize investor's returns.

For investors who want a regular income the main focus is on improving the credit quality of the portfolio. Sundaram was the first to launch funds in themes such as Mid-cap, Capex, Leadership, Rural India and Micro cap.

It targets to increase the value of each and every stakeholder and aspires to hold a high degree of business ethics.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

holdings.company_name: Multi Commodity Exchange Of India Ltd.
Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy Ltd.

fund_manager_details.education: Mr. Gopalakrishnan is an MBA from Bradley University, USA and Masters in Finance (Investments) from Drexel University, USA.
fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining Sundaram Mutual Fund, he has worked with Principal Mutual Fund, Canara Robeco AMC, PGIM India Mutual Fund, Hudson Fairfax Group,USA, and Sun F & C Asset Management Ltd.
